mapper.select: select a.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select a.* from users a order by userid) a)a where rn between #{pagesize}*(#{page} - 1) + 1 and #{pagesize}*#{page}
mapper.insert: insert into users (userId, userNm, reg_dt, pass, addr1, addr2, zipcode, alias, filename, realfilename) values(#{userId}, #{userNm}, #{reg_dt}, #{pass}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcode}, #{alias}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realfilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update users set userNm = #{userNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass = #{pass, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias = #{alias, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_dt = #{reg_dt, jdbcType=DATE}, addr1 = #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr2 = #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zipcode = #{zipcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realfilename = #{realfilename , jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userid = #{userId}
